none: Pig DNA - Demonstrate Overpowering Might demo
Pig DNA - Demonstrate Overpowering Might demo

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 22, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
I've raved about these mutants in these pages before, and the legend has only grown as their live performances have increased in intensity...but on 2014's Demonstrate Overpowering Might, PIG DNA have outdone themselves. Total and complete noise so all encompassing that when the tape descends into a three minute track titled "Noize," the casual listener (if there can be such a thing with this band) will hardly notice. While I'm still not convinced that the success of PIG DNA is intentional, I am certain that they are setting new standards for outsider/noise punk. This thing is a total mindfukk. D.O.M.
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-HYo45JQ4YIU/VYgSL55rcAI/AAAAAAAAMiM/zoYROL5LunM/s1600/pig%2BDNA%2Bcover.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-iTZJgionZ5o/VYgUIIfuSMI/AAAAAAAAMio/NJH5lyCj76o/s1600/pig%2BDNA%2Bimg.jpg
